title: Curve Schema
description: A Curve represents a series of points on a plot. Typically, interest rates, volatility or forward prices.

id.description: The unique identifier for the curve.

date.description: The observation date for the data in this object. Formatted as YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

currency_code.description: The currency reference code in accordance with ISO 4217 standards.

name.description: The internal name of the curve.

values.description: The list of values for this curve.

reference.description: The reference item for the value. (x-axis)

value.description: The reference value for this rate. (y-axis)
